column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////Do I want a delicious
column2: melt in my mouth croissant with a flat white or the turkey sandwich or the flatbread? The point is I can't choose because all are so delicious. If you are looking for a filling
column4: do the turkey club. You won't be disappointed. I sub the white bread for multigrain and ask for spicy mustard but the quality ya the turkey
column6: avocado and bread make the perfect lunch for me. Common bond has a ton of options and the best part is that I can take a loaf home for the rest of the week.
